Get a GitHub Pages site 

GET /repos/:owner/:repo/pages

Response

Status: 200 OK

{
  "url": "https://api.github.com/repos/github/developer.github.com/pages",
  "status": "built",
  "cname": "developer.github.com",
  "custom_404": false,
  "html_url": "https://developer.github.com",
  "source": {
    "branch": "master",
    "directory": "/"
  }
}
